metadata.title: USN-7014-1 -- nginx vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the nginx ngx_http_mp4 module incorrectly handled certain malformed mp4 files. In environments where the mp4 directive is in use, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause nginx to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7014-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnginx-mod-http-auth-pam - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-cache-purge - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-dav-ext - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-echo - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-fancyindex - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-geoip - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-geoip2 - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-headers-more-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-image-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-ndk - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-perl - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-subs-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-uploadprogress - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-upstream-fair - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-http-xslt-filter - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-mail - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-nchan - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-rtmp - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-stream - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-stream-geoip - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 libnginx-mod-stream-geoip2 - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 nginx - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 nginx-common - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 nginx-core - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 nginx-doc - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 nginx-extras - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 nginx-full - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 nginx-light - 1.18.0-6ubuntu14.5 No subscription required
